ul.li: Include all codes defined in https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/public-health/CodeSystem/be-cs-populationscreening-next-invitation-type version 📦1.0.0

title.value: Population Screening Next Invitation Type Value Set

description.value: Value Set containing the codes for the type of the next invitation (or exclusion of next invitation)
